      public static List<Student> filterStudents(String username, String name, String department)
      Retrieve records from the database.
      Parameters:
      username - the filter for username.
      name - the filter for name.
      department - the filter for department.
      Returns:
      a list of records matches the filter.

    • addStudent

      public static void addStudent(String username, String name, String age, String department, String password, String gender)
      Add the record to the database.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the new student.
      name - the name of the new student.
      age - the age of the new student.
      department - the department of the new student.
      password - the password of the new student.
      gender - the gender of the new student.

    • update

      public void update()
      Called when the user selects a record and clicks the update button. Update the selected record according to the form.

    • updateStudent

      public static void updateStudent(Student selectedStudent, String username, String name, String age, String department, String password, String gender)
      Perform the update in the database.
      Parameters:
      selectedStudent - the student to be updated.
      username - the new username.
      name - the new name.
      age - the new age.
      department - the new department.
      password - the new password.
      gender - the new gender.
